software_engineer.title: Software Engineer
software_engineer.description: A skilled software developer working on innovative web applications.

events_template.title: Morning Standup
events_template.description: Daily team sync-up, discussing tasks and blockers.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style office meeting, diverse team, whiteboard with agile tasks

events_template.title: Coding Session
events_template.description: Deep work on a new feature, writing clean and efficient code.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer coding at a desk with multiple monitors, focused expression, lines of code on screen

events_template.title: Team Lunch
events_template.description: Casual discussion with colleagues over lunch.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style office cafeteria, colleagues chatting and laughing

events_template.title: Code Review
events_template.description: Reviewing a teammate's pull request, providing constructive feedback.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developers collaborating on code review, side-by-side, pointing at screen

events_template.title: Debugging a Bug
events_template.description: Troubleshooting a complex issue in the application.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer looking frustrated at a screen full of error messages, coffee cup nearby

events_template.title: Feature Demo
events_template.description: Presenting the newly developed feature to stakeholders.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style presentation room, developer confidently showing a new feature on a large screen to a small audience

events_template.title: Learning New Tech
events_template.description: Exploring new technologies and frameworks for personal growth.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer reading documentation, surrounded by holographic displays of code and diagrams

data_scientist.title: Data Scientist
data_scientist.description: An analytical mind extracting insights from vast datasets.

events_template.title: Data Exploration
events_template.description: Analyzing raw data to understand its structure and identify patterns.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style data scientist at a desk with complex graphs and charts on multiple screens, deep in thought

events_template.title: Model Training
events_template.description: Developing and training machine learning models.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style data scientist interacting with a holographic display showing a neural network training, glowing data streams

events_template.title: Research Meeting
events_template.description: Discussing research findings and strategies with the team.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style meeting room, data scientists presenting findings with slides full of statistics and visualizations

events_template.title: Feature Engineering
events_template.description: Creating new features from existing data to improve model performance.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style data scientist transforming data, abstract visualizations of data manipulation

events_template.title: Dashboard Creation
events_template.description: Building interactive dashboards to visualize key metrics and insights.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style data scientist designing a dashboard with drag-and-drop interfaces, colorful charts coming to life

events_template.title: Presenting Insights
events_template.description: Communicating complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style data scientist confidently explaining insights to a business team, charts and graphs illustrating points

ux_designer.title: UX Designer
ux_designer.description: A creative professional focused on crafting intuitive and delightful user experiences.

events_template.title: User Research Review
events_template.description: Reviewing user interview transcripts and survey results to understand user needs.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style UX designer analyzing user research data on a tablet, sticky notes with user feedback around

events_template.title: Wireframing Session
events_template.description: Sketching low-fidelity wireframes for a new feature.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style UX designer rapidly sketching wireframes on a digital canvas, ideas flowing

events_template.title: Design Critique
events_template.description: Receiving feedback on designs from fellow designers.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style design studio, designers discussing a UI prototype on a large screen, constructive criticism

events_template.title: Prototyping Interaction
events_template.description: Creating interactive prototypes to test user flows.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style UX designer meticulously crafting an interactive prototype, seamless animations on screen

events_template.title: Usability Testing
events_template.description: Observing users interacting with a prototype to identify pain points.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style user in a usability testing lab, UX designer observing from behind a one-way mirror, taking notes

events_template.title: Iteration and Refinement
events_template.description: Applying insights from testing to refine design solutions.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style UX designer making precise adjustments to a UI design, a look of thoughtful concentration

events_template.title: Stakeholder Presentation
events_template.description: Presenting finalized designs to project stakeholders.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style presentation, UX designer confidently showcasing final designs to a team, positive reactions

technical_writer.title: Technical Writer
technical_writer.description: Technical writers create documentation for software, hardware, or other technical products. They explain complex information clearly and concisely for a target audience.

events_template.title: Research and Planning
events_template.description: Gathering information and planning documentation structure.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style technical writer at a desk, researching on computer, surrounded by notes and diagrams

events_template.title: Drafting Content
events_template.description: Writing clear and concise technical content.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style technical writer typing on a keyboard, code and text on screen, focused expression

events_template.title: Team Review
events_template.description: Collaborating with engineers and product managers for content review.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style team reviewing a document on a large screen, discussions and feedback

events_template.title: Editing and Proofreading
events_template.description: Refining content for accuracy, clarity, and grammar.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style technical writer meticulously editing a document on screen, magnifying glass icon

events_template.title: Tooling and Publishing
events_template.description: Using documentation tools to publish content to various platforms.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style technical writer working with a documentation tool, publishing icon on screen

blockchain_developer.title: Blockchain Developer
blockchain_developer.description: Builds and maintains decentralized applications and smart contracts.

events_template.title: Smart Contract Development
events_template.description: Writing and testing smart contracts on a blockchain platform.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer writing smart contracts, glowing code on screen, blockchain symbols

events_template.title: Decentralized App (dApp) Design
events_template.description: Designing the architecture for decentralized applications.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer designing dApp UI, interconnected nodes and blockchain network visualization

events_template.title: Security Audit
events_template.description: Conducting security audits of smart contracts and blockchain solutions.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer meticulously auditing smart contract code, magnifying glass on vulnerabilities

events_template.title: Consensus Mechanism Research
events_template.description: Researching and implementing different blockchain consensus mechanisms.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer studying complex consensus algorithms, flowcharts and diagrams

events_template.title: Community Collaboration
events_template.description: Collaborating with the blockchain developer community on open-source projects.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developers collaborating online, code sharing and discussion forums, blockchain logos

quantum_computing_engineer.title: Quantum Computing Engineer
quantum_computing_engineer.description: Develops and maintains quantum computing systems.

events_template.title: Quantum Algorithm Design
events_template.description: Designing algorithms for quantum computers.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style scientist designing quantum algorithms on a holographic interface, swirling quantum particles

events_template.title: Quantum Hardware Experimentation
events_template.description: Conducting experiments on quantum computing hardware.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style scientist in a futuristic lab, interacting with complex quantum computing machinery, glowing circuits

events_template.title: Quantum Software Development
events_template.description: Developing software and tools for quantum programming.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style developer coding quantum programs, intricate quantum logic gates on screen

events_template.title: Theoretical Research
events_template.description: Engaging in theoretical research to advance quantum computing.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style scientist in a library, surrounded by advanced physics books and equations, deep in thought

events_template.title: Collaboration with Physicists
events_template.description: Collaborating with quantum physicists on new breakthroughs.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style scientists collaborating, discussing complex quantum theories on a whiteboard

medical_coder.title: Medical Coder
medical_coder.description: Medical coders translate medical diagnoses and procedures into standardized codes used for billing and insurance purposes. They ensure accurate medical record keeping and facilitate healthcare financial processes.

events_template.title: Review Medical Records
events_template.description: Analyzing patient charts and documentation.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic medical coder reviewing digital patient records, multiple screens, focused expression

events_template.title: Assign ICD-10 Codes
events_template.description: Assigning appropriate ICD-10 diagnosis codes.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic medical coder entering codes into a system, medical codebook open nearby

events_template.title: Lunch Break
events_template.description: Taking a lunch break.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic office break room, diverse colleagues chatting

events_template.title: Assign CPT Codes
events_template.description: Assigning appropriate CPT procedure codes.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic medical coder using CPT coding software, hands on keyboard

events_template.title: Query Physicians
events_template.description: Querying physicians for clarification on documentation.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic medical coder speaking with a doctor in a hospital setting, clarifying patient notes

events_template.title: Billing and Reimbursement
events_template.description: Ensuring accurate coding for billing and reimbursement.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic medical coder reviewing billing statements, financial documents on screen

ai_ethicist.title: AI Ethicist
ai_ethicist.description: Ensures AI development aligns with ethical principles.

events_template.title: Ethical AI Review
events_template.description: Reviewing AI models for fairness and bias.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style AI ethicist examining code for ethical implications, glowing lines of ethical guidelines

events_template.title: Policy Development
events_template.description: Developing policies for responsible AI deployment.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style AI ethicist writing policy documents, legal texts and AI symbols merging

events_template.title: Public Outreach
events_template.description: Educating the public on AI ethics.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style AI ethicist giving a public lecture on AI ethics, diverse audience engaged

cybersecurity_analyst.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
cybersecurity_analyst.description: Protects computer systems and networks from cyber threats.

events_template.title: Vulnerability Scan
events_template.description: Conducting scans to identify security weaknesses.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic cybersecurity analyst running vulnerability scans, network diagrams on screen, alert icons

events_template.title: Incident Response
events_template.description: Responding to security breaches and incidents.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic cybersecurity analyst working on an incident, frantic typing, red alerts on screen

events_template.title: Security Patching
events_template.description: Applying security patches and updates.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic cybersecurity analyst deploying patches, green checkmarks on screen

cloud_architect.title: Cloud Architect
cloud_architect.description: Designs and implements cloud computing strategies.

events_template.title: Cloud Infrastructure Design
events_template.description: Designing scalable and secure cloud infrastructure.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic cloud architect designing network diagrams, cloud symbols, data flow charts

events_template.title: Cloud Migration Strategy
events_template.description: Developing strategies for migrating applications to the cloud.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic cloud architect presenting migration plan to a team, cloud migration roadmap on screen

events_template.title: Cloud Security Implementation
events_template.description: Implementing security best practices for cloud environments.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic cloud architect configuring security policies, firewall rules on screen

events_template.title: Automating Deployments
events_template.description: Automating continuous integration and continuous delivery pipelines.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic devops engineer configuring CI/CD pipeline, automated deployment flow on screen

events_template.title: Infrastructure as Code
events_template.description: Implementing infrastructure as code using tools like Terraform.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic devops engineer writing Terraform code, infrastructure diagrams

events_template.title: Monitoring and Logging
events_template.description: Setting up monitoring and logging for applications in production.
events_template.visual_prompt: realistic devops engineer reviewing dashboards, log data streams, alert notifications

machine_learning_engineer.title: Machine Learning Engineer
machine_learning_engineer.description: Builds and deploys machine learning models.

events_template.title: Model Development
events_template.description: Developing and training machine learning models.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style machine learning engineer coding, neural network visualization, data flowing

events_template.title: Model Deployment
events_template.description: Deploying machine learning models to production.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style machine learning engineer deploying model to cloud, server racks, glowing connections

events_template.title: Model Monitoring
events_template.description: Monitoring model performance and retraining.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style machine learning engineer reviewing dashboards, model performance metrics, alert icons

full_stack_developer.title: Full Stack Developer
full_stack_developer.description: Develops both front-end and back-end web applications.

events_template.title: Frontend Development
events_template.description: Building user interfaces with React.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style frontend developer coding React components, UI designs on screen

events_template.title: Backend API Development
events_template.description: Developing RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style backend developer coding API endpoints, server architecture diagrams

events_template.title: Database Design
events_template.description: Designing and optimizing database schemas.
events_template.visual_prompt: anime-style full stack developer designing database schema, ER diagrams
